ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
You want to chat with me? That’s a great way to
spend your time!
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Any time I
spend with you is worth it!
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2101_01_10:
This is just something I found, but would it be
useful to you?
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I’ll watch you use it so I can learn!
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
There’s something I want to give you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Will you accept it?
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2102_02_10: It will be satisfying to see you use it!
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
You’ve always helped me, so this is a
little thank-you.
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
I want to build a good relationship with
you...through mutual exchange.
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2103_03_10: If you need help with anything, let me know!
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2201_01_10: Hey! Let’s have a quick chat!
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I’m looking forward to hearing the stories you
have for me today, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
Let’s get started, shall we? Talking to you is
something I enjoy.
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2302_01_10: A gift for me? Thanks! I’ll treasure it.
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Hey hey! Are you sure I can have this?
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2301_02_10: I must get you something extraordinary in return!
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
I never get bored when I talk with you—and I’ve
learned a lot, too!
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Time sure flew, didn’t it. You always
have something interesting to say,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
When I come here, I can talk to people who
have different opinions.
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
This is a valuable opportunity for me to learn
how people on Pasio—and in this era—think.
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
I’m thankful that you invited me here,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
In my era, communicating with someone far away
isn’t easy...
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
I never would have thought that this small device
could allow one to communicate anytime and
anywhere one wishes...
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Does that mean people from this era have a lot of
spare time?
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
You need to regulate the way you use items and
not be controlled by them. It’s complicated, huh...
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
The way you use something can make it either
convenient or inconvenient.
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
But every item and device was made to improve
the lives of people and Pokémon.
ch0284_00_seki_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
I’m sure you know the right way to use items,
so I hope you continue to teach me!
